item.title: Contact
item.description: Offers, questions and inquiries please send to paul@mayer-zuffenhausen.de Vita From 2020-2022 I worked as Software Engineering Intern at Iteratec, enhancing clients by creating modern digital solutions using Java, TypeScript, React, Python and various other technologies and frameworks. Teaching 'Theoretische Informatik' for two terms as a tutor. Univeristy degree B.Sc. Computer Science estimated finish in spring 2023. Acquired 'Allgemeine Hochschulreife Abitur' in 2017. I love climbing.
